tool_description: showing all the COVID messages around world
name: yiqinglive
title: yiqinglive

api_list.name: Get all Covid news
api_list.description: With this endpoint you will get all the covid related news we have in all the resources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yiqinglive.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yiqinglive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yiqinglive.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yiqinglive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
